'''''The Gulls Once Wept''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete the {{Quest|Deluge of Wrathful Waters}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the Japanese visual novel series ''{{w|Umineko When They Cry}}''.
